action.description: On motion by Senator PIERCE of Cumberland the Senate RECEDED and CONCURRED to The Majority Ought to Pass As Amended by Committee Amendment "A" (S-247) as Amended by House Amendment "A" (H-639) thereto and PASSAGE TO BE ENGROSSED AS AMENDED by Committee Amendment "A" (S-247) as Amended by House Amendment "A" (H-639) thereto in concurrence.
